long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View and create hidden "wungle" text in tumblr posts.

Use the new "↶W" button at the top right of a post to flip it, revealing any hidden wungle text.
In the post editor, you can use the new "W↷" (wungle) and "↶W" (unwungle) buttons to hide or unhide any text you have selected.

Inspired by this tumblr post by morphimus: https://www.tumblr.com/morphimus/710837261845037056/it-looked-kinda-like-this-the-post-would-be-the
